source.6d077088:
import pandas_datareader as web
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns 
import datetime
source.cb4189dc:
start = datetime.datetime(2005, 1, 1)
end = datetime.datetime(2021, 3, 5)

sfr_usd = web.DataReader('CHF=X', 'yahoo', start, end) #Swiss Franc Dollar exchange
sp500 = web.DataReader('^GSPC', 'yahoo', start, end) #SP500
smi = web.DataReader('^SSMI', 'yahoo', start, end) #SMI
source.0bd0e9cd:
sfr_usd = sfr_usd['Adj Close']
sp500_price = sp500['Adj Close']
smi_price = smi['Adj Close']
source.d6daf22e:
sp500_sfr = sp500_price * sfr_usd
smi_dollar = smi_price / sfr_usd
source.c0eb5e8e:
fig = plt.figure()
ax1 = plt.subplot2grid((4, 4), (0, 0), rowspan=3, colspan=4)
ax1.plot(smi_dollar, label='smi_dollar')
ax1.plot(smi_price, label='smi_srf')
ax1.legend()
plt.title('smi in dollar and chf')
ax2 = plt.subplot2grid((4, 4), (3,0), rowspan=1, colspan=4)
ax2.plot(sfr_usd.index, sfr_usd)
plt.title("chf dollar exchange")
plt.subplots_adjust(hspace=0.8)
plt.gcf().set_size_inches(12, 8)
source.313e5b03:
fig = plt.figure()
ax1 = plt.subplot2grid((4, 4), (0, 0), rowspan=3, colspan=4)
ax1.plot(sp500_sfr, label='sp500 chf')
ax1.plot(sp500_price, label='sp500')
ax1.legend()
plt.title('sp500 in dollar and swissfranc')
ax2 = plt.subplot2grid((4, 4), (3,0), rowspan=1, colspan=4)
ax2.plot(sfr_usd.index, sfr_usd)
plt.title("swiss dollar exchange")
plt.subplots_adjust(hspace=0.8)
plt.gcf().set_size_inches(12, 8)
